input.sentences: on our hike today we saw many interesting tree formations .
i really enjoyed seeing all the different vanes in the rocks .
it was really fun taking this silhouette photo .
i loved this dead-looking tree and felt it needed to be photographed in black and white .
at the end of the day we saw this beautiful tree against the sunset .
output.sentences: Today we took a hike in the desert.
I was really interested in the rock formations because I'd learned about them in college.
Jill was interested in the way that shadows appeared in the landscape.
She played around the color/black and white shots to understand shadows better.
We stayed until sunset and then headed back to our apartment.
